name: High Roll
description:
A game about connecting Dice and being on a quest to kill the Cube King!

Inspired by Dicey Dungeons and the board game Rummy.

A very short (7-10 min) game with multiple enemies and items.

Remember to leave a review!

Credits:
Art, Programming, Game Design: Lighted
Sound Effects: freesound.org and ChipTone
Music:  Evan King (Links below)
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCT1ZkP03V18LmOj8zbyP-Dw?
